contentfulProduct.seoDescription: Make everyday a spa day with our top-of-the-line towel bundle crafted of 100% premium Turkish cotton. Supremely soft and plush, you'll be wondering how you used anything else. Bundle includes two bath towels, two hand towels and two washcloths.
contentfulProduct.title: Turkish Spa Towel Bundle
contentfulProduct.subtitle: Traditional retail price $109

content.value: Add a pair of Organic Turkish Waffle Slippers to your order for just $14.90 $24.90

Make everyday a spa day with our top-of-the-line towel bundle crafted of 100% premium Turkish cotton. Supremely soft and plush, you'll be wondering how you used anything else. Bundle includes two bath towels, two hand towels and two washcloths.
Made from 100% premium, long staple Turkish cotton
Set includes two 27" x 54" bath towels, two 20" x 30" hand towels & two 12" x 12" washcloths
700 grams per square meter
Made with care in Turkey

Machine wash cool with like colors using mild laundry detergent. Avoid washing with items that have zippers, Velcro, hooks, or other sharp objects that could snag or pull the loops. In the event of a snagged loop, cut it with scissors. Avoid contact with skin care products to prevent discoloration. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low or hang dry. Remove promptly.
